info.name: Flean Flutter App APIs
info.description:
# Flean Flutter App API Collection

This collection contains all API endpoints for the Flean Flutter mobile application.

## Base URLs

| Environment | Base URL |
|-------------|----------|
| Production (ALB) | `http://flean-services-alb-806741654.ap-south-1.elb.amazonaws.com` |
| Production (CloudFront) | `https://api.flean.ai` |
| Local Development | `http://localhost:8080` |

## API Categories

1. **Search API** - Product search with sorting and filtering
2. **Home Page APIs** - Home screen data (banners, categories, products)
3. **Product APIs** - PDP, Scanner, Catalogue

## Authentication

No authentication required for these APIs.

## Common Response Format

```json
{
  "success": true,
  "data": { ... },
  "meta": { ... }  // Optional pagination/stats
}
```

## Error Response Format

```json
{
  "success": false,
  "error": {
    "code": "ERROR_CODE",
    "message": "Human-readable message"
  }
}
```

item.name: 1. Search API
item.description:
Product search endpoint with sorting and filtering capabilities.

Used for: Search results page, filtered product listings

request.description:
## Basic Product Search

Simple search by keyword. Returns products sorted by relevance (Flean percentile ranking).

### Use Case
- User types in search bar
- Initial search results

### Request
```json
{
    "query": "protein bars"
}
```

### Response Fields
- `products[]` - Array of matching products
  - `id` - Elasticsearch product ID
  - `name` - Product name
  - `brand` - Brand name
  - `price` - Selling price (INR)
  - `mrp` - Maximum retail price
  - `qty` - Quantity/weight
  - `image_url` - Product image CDN URL
  - `macro_tags[]` - Top 2 nutritional highlights
  - `nutrition{}` - Raw nutritional values
  - `flean_score` - Quality score (-10 to 10)
  - `flean_percentile` - Quality percentile (0-100)
- `total_hits` - Total matching products
- `returned` - Products in response
- `sort_by` - Applied sort option

response.name: Basic Search - Success
response.body:
{
    "products": [
        {
            "id": "01K1B1BPGN2WAXFB5DNSGXX4W3",
            "name": "Yoga Bar 20g Protein Bar, Almond Fudge",
            "brand": "Yoga Bar",
            "price": 100.0,
            "mrp": 120.0,
            "currency": "INR",
            "qty": "60 g",
            "image_url": "https://cdn.flean.ai/products/yogabar-protein.jpg",
            "macro_tags": [
                {"label": "20 gms of Protein", "nutrient": "protein", "value": 20, "unit": "g"},
                {"label": "225 Calories", "nutrient": "calories", "value": 225, "unit": "kcal"}
            ],
            "nutrition": {
                "protein_g": 20,
                "carbs_g": 28,
                "fat_g": 8,
                "fiber_g": 3,
                "calories": 225
            },
            "flean_score": 2.5,
            "flean_percentile": 85.2,
            "in_stock": true
        }
    ],
    "total_hits": 2486,
    "returned": 20,
    "sort_by": "relevance"
}

request.description:
## Search with Sorting

Search with custom sort order.

### Sort Options

| Value | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `relevance` | Default - Flean quality ranking |
| `price_asc` | Price Low to High |
| `price_desc` | Price High to Low |
| `protein_desc` | Protein High to Low |
| `fiber_desc` | Fibre High to Low |
| `fat_asc` | Fat Low to High |

### Use Case
- Sort button/dropdown in search results
- "Sort by Price" feature

## Search with Filters

Apply filters to narrow search results. All filters use AND logic.

### Price Range Options

| Value | Meaning |
|-------|--------|
| `below_99` | Below Rs.99 |
| `100_249` | Rs.100-249 |
| `250_499` | Rs.250-499 |
| `above_500` | Above Rs.500 |

### Flean Score Options

| Value | Meaning |
|-------|--------|
| `10` | Top 10% quality |
| `9_plus` | Top 20% quality |
| `8_plus` | Top 30% quality |
| `7_plus` | Top 40% quality |

### Use Case
- Filter chips/buttons in search results
- Price filter selection
- Quality filter

## Search with Dietary Filters

Filter products by dietary preferences and restrictions.

### Preference Options (OR logic within)

| Value | Meaning |
|-------|--------|
| `no_palm_oil` | No Palm Oil |
| `no_added_sugar` | No Added Sugar |
| `no_additives` | No Preservatives/Artificial Colors |

### Dietary Options (AND logic between)

| Value | Meaning |
|-------|--------|
| `dairy_free` | Dairy Free |
| `gluten_free` | Gluten Free |

### Use Case
- Dietary preference toggles
- Health-conscious filtering

## Combined Search (Sort + Filters)

Full-featured search with sorting and multiple filters combined.

### Use Case
- Advanced search page
- When user applies multiple filters + sort

### Note
- All filters use AND logic
- Products must match ALL specified filters

item.name: 2. Home Page APIs
item.description:
APIs for the Flutter app home screen.

Used for: Home page data loading, promotional content, featured products

request.description:
## Get Promotional Banners

Fetch promotional banners/ads for the home page carousel.

### Use Case
- Home page hero carousel
- Promotional ads section

### Response Fields
- `banners[]` - Array of banner objects
  - `id` - Unique banner ID
  - `main_heading` - Large text heading
  - `sub_heading_1` - First subheading
  - `sub_heading_2` - Second subheading (optional)
  - `button_text` - CTA button text
  - `button_link` - Deep link/URL
  - `image_url` - Banner image URL
  - `background_color` - Hex color code

response.name: Get Banners - Success

request.description:
## Get Product Categories

Fetch product categories for the home page. Returns 4 by default.

### Query Parameters
- `all=true` - Return all categories (for 'See All' page)

### Use Case
- Category grid on home page
- Category selection page

### Response Fields
- `categories[]` - Array of category objects
  - `id` - Category ID
  - `name` - Display name
  - `icon_url` - Category icon URL
  - `deep_link` - Navigation link
- `has_more` - Whether more categories exist
- `total_count` - Total category count

## Get All Categories

Fetch all product categories (for 'See All' page).

### Use Case
- Category selection page
- 'See All Categories' screen

## Get Best Selling Products

Fetch best-selling products for the home page. Products are fetched from Elasticsearch using pre-configured IDs.

### Use Case
- "Best Selling" section on home page
- Featured products display

### Response Fields
- `products[]` - Array of product objects with full details
- `section_title` - Section heading text

response.name: Get Best Selling - Success

request.description:
## Get Curated Products (Home)

Fetch 4 random curated products for the home page. Returns different products on each call (randomized from pool).

### Use Case
- "Curated For You" section on home page
- Personalized recommendations

### Response Fields
- `products[]` - 4 randomly selected products
- `section_title` - Section heading
- `has_more` - Whether more products exist
- `total_in_pool` - Total curated products available

## Get All Curated Products

Fetch all curated products (for 'See All' page).

### Use Case
- "See All" page for curated products
- Full curated collection display

## Get Why Flean Cards

Fetch value proposition cards explaining Flean's benefits.

### Use Case
- "Why Flean" section on home page
- App intro/onboarding

### Response Fields
- `cards[]` - Array of card objects
  - `id` - Card ID
  - `main_heading` - Card title
  - `text_body` - Description text
  - `icon_url` - Card icon/image URL

response.name: Get Why Flean - Success

request.description:
## Get Brand Collaborations

Fetch exclusive partner brand information.

### Use Case
- "Exclusive Collaborations" section
- Partner brands showcase

## Refresh Home Page Cache

Clear the JSON file cache to force reload data on next request.

### Use Case
- After updating home page data files
- Force refresh without server restart
- Admin/debug tool

response.name: Refresh Cache - Success

request.description:
## Home Page Health Check

Check status of all home page data files.

### Use Case
- Monitoring/alerting
- Debug data loading issues

item.name: 3. Product APIs
item.description:
Product-specific APIs for detail pages, scanning, and catalogues.

Used for: PDP, barcode scanner, category browsing

request.description:
## Get Product Detail (PDP)

Fetch complete product data by Elasticsearch ID. Returns raw ES data for Flutter app to parse.

### Path Parameter
- `product_id` - Elasticsearch product ID

### Use Case
- Product Detail Page (PDP)
- Product quick view
- After scanning a product

### Response
Returns full raw Elasticsearch `_source` document with all available fields:
- Basic info (name, brand, price, mrp)
- Images (hero_image)
- Nutritional data (category_data.nutritional)
- Flean scores (flean_score, stats)
- Ingredients
- Package claims
- And more...

response.name: PDP - Success

request.description:
## Scanner API (Image Lookup)

Scan a product image to identify and fetch product details. Uses Anthropic Claude Vision to extract product name and brand, then searches Elasticsearch.

### Request Body
```json
{
    "image": "<base64_image_data>"
}
```

### Image Format
- Data URL: `data:image/jpeg;base64,...`
- Raw base64: `/9j/4AAQSkZ...`
- Supported: JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP
- Max size: 5 MB

### Use Case
- Barcode/product scanner feature
- Camera-based product lookup
- "Scan to find" functionality

### Response Fields
- `extracted` - Vision AI extraction results
  - `product_name` - Detected product name
  - `brand_name` - Detected brand
  - `ocr_text` - All visible text
  - `category_group` - Detected category
- `products[]` - Matching products from ES

response.name: Scanner - Success
Scanner - No Match
Scanner - Invalid Image

request.description:
## Get Catalogue Products

List products by subcategory with pagination.

### Query Parameters
- `subcategory` (required) - Category path (e.g., 'chips', 'f_and_b/food/munchies_and_snacks')
- `page` (optional) - Page number, 0-indexed (default: 0)
- `size` (optional) - Products per page, max 100 (default: 20)
- `sort` (optional) - 'flean_score' (default) or 'price'

### Use Case
- Category listing page
- Browse products by category
- Subcategory product grid

### Response Fields
- `products[]` - Array of products (raw ES data)
- `meta` - Pagination info
  - `total` - Total products in category
  - `page` - Current page
  - `size` - Page size
  - `total_pages` - Total pages
  - `has_next` - More pages available
  - `has_prev` - Previous page exists

response.name: Catalogue - Success

request.description:
## Get Catalogue (Pagination Example)

Example of fetching page 2 of catalogue results.

### Use Case
- Infinite scroll loading
- "Load More" button
- Pagination navigation
